title: Remove direct printing from CommandExecutor methods
description:
## Problem

CommandExecutor has ~87 public methods across 12 files. Several methods print directly to stdout/stderr instead of returning data for the CLI layer to format:

- `validate.rs`: `status()` has 7 `println!()` calls, prints `âœ“ Repository is valid`
- `document.rs`: `document_history()` and `list_document_references()` print directly
- `issue.rs`: `create_issue()` and `update_issue()` use `eprintln!` for warnings (2 sites)
- `mod.rs`: `require_active_lease()` uses `eprintln!` in Warn mode (1 site)

## Approach

1. Change methods to return structured data (e.g., `StatusSummary`, `Vec<String>` warnings, `DocumentHistory`)
2. Move all `println!`/`eprintln!` to the CLI layer in `main.rs`
3. Methods that currently accept a `json: bool` parameter should instead always return data; the CLI layer decides the format

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Zero `println!`/`eprintln!` in `commands/` module (excluding test code)
- [ ] All affected methods return data structures instead of printing
- [ ] CLI formatting in `main.rs` handles both human and JSON output
- [ ] All existing tests pass
